contents.text: Welcome to Apptimize in San Francisco, the leading developer tool for mobile A/B testing and release management.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To schedule a demo of our A/B testing platform, press 1.
All our sales representatives are currently assisting other callers. Please hold the line and we'll connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a brief demo of the A/B testing platform this week.
I’d like to book a live demo of your A/B testing platform for my team’s upcoming project.
I want to schedule a hands-on SDK demo for the Apptimize mobile A/B testing platform.
I’d like to schedule a live demo of your A/B testing platform and have someone walk me through it.
I’d like to arrange a guided walkthrough of the A/B testing platform for my project.

contents.text: For pricing and plan details, press 2.
Our pricing specialists are currently busy. Please stay on the line and we'll be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I want clear pricing tiers and plan comparisons for your A/B testing service.
I need detailed information on your subscription tiers, including any veteran discounts you offer.
I’m looking for a detailed pricing breakdown on enterprise plans for multi-variant A/B tests.
Could you explain your subscription plans and pricing so I can choose the right option?
I need detailed information on subscription tiers and pricing options.

contents.text: For technical support and account assistance, press 2.
If you need help setting up A/B tests or experiments, press 1.
All our technical support agents are currently helping other customers. Please hold the line and we'll connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: Help me set up and launch a new A/B experiment in my mobile app.
I’m looking for assistance configuring my first A/B test in the platform.
I need help configuring and deploying an A/B test experiment via the Apptimize SDK.
I need help setting up my first A/B test on your platform.
Can someone help me set up and configure A/B tests in the mobile SDK for my study?

contents.text: For release management or integration support, press 2.
Our release management experts are on other calls at the moment. Please hold and we'll connect you as soon as possible.

navigationGoals: Assist me with integrating your release management tools into our CI/CD pipeline.
I need help integrating your SDK into our mobile release pipeline.
I need integration support to set up Apptimize in our CI/CD pipeline for release management.
I’m looking for assistance integrating your release management tool into my workflow.
I’m looking for support integrating the SDK and managing release deployments.
